docs.text: brew install apache-flink cd /usr/local/Cellar/apache-flink/1.10.1/libexec ./bin/start-cluster.sh you can see the cluster running at http://localhost:8081/ Start sql client ./bin/sql-client.sh embedded This uses the configuration defined in ./conf/sql-client-defaults.yaml SELECT 'Hello World'; SET execution.result-mode=table; SELECT name, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM (VALUES ('Bob'), ('Alice'), ('Greg'), ('Bob')) AS NameTable(name) GROUP BY name;
docs.title: Flink sql client

docs.text: Kafka start/stop local kafka - docker-compose -f docker-compose-kafka.yml up - docker-compose -f docker-compose-kafka.yml down kafka broker localhost:9092 schema-registry-ui: localhost:8001
docs.title: Kafka

docs.text: - docker-compose -f docker-compose-kafka.yml up - docker-compose -f docker-compose-kafka.yml down
